articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets slip as investors await U.S. jobs report; South Korea's Kakao Bank jumps in debut - CNBC
articles.description: The closely watched U.S. jobs report for July is set to be released on Friday stateside.
articles.content:

articles.description: Up against larger Chinese vessels, small-scale fishermen from the Philippines and Vietnam share their ‘scary’ encounters at sea with the programme Insight.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: AirAsia nets RM240mil from Fly Leasing-Carlyle Aviation merger - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Bernama) -- AirAsia Group Bhd (AAGB) has gained gross proceeds of US$56.83mil (RM240mil) from the merger between Fly Leasing Ltd and Carlyle Aviation Partners.
